entities.name: Simple Contract Module
entities.description: Simple Contract (Paid Contract) - Manages paid contracts for commercial transactions in construction and real estate fields with a tab-based interface
entities.main_screens: Basic Information (Tab 1); Order Information (Tab 2); Accounting Information (Tab 3); Cancellation Information (Tab 4)
entities.key_features: Manages four main aspects: basic information, orders, accounting, and cancellation; Tab-based navigation system; Integration with project and customer management systems
entities.documentation_structure: yuusyou-kihon (primary); order-info-simple-contract (impact analysis); accounting-info-simple-contract (impact analysis); cancel-info-simple-contract (impact analysis)

entities.name: Contract List Screen
entities.title: Contract List
entities.access_level: User with contract list view permission
entities.description: Entry point screen showing list of contracts - allows users to select and navigate to contract details

entities.name: Sales Selection Screen
entities.title: Sales Selection
entities.description: Entry point screen for selecting sales items before creating simple contract

entities.name: Case Screen
entities.title: Case Screen
entities.description: Entry point screen for creating simple contract from case management module

entities.name: Contract Search Screen
entities.title: Contract Search
entities.description: Entry point screen for searching existing contracts - allows navigation to contract details via contract link

entities.name: Simple Input Contract Screen
entities.title: Simple Input (Contract Card)
entities.description: Main screen for simple contract management with 4 tabs: Basic Information, Order Information, Accounting Information, and Cancellation Information

entities.name: Basic Information Tab
entities.key_functions: Contract initialization; New contract registration; Customer/contractor update; Contract validation
entities.description: Primary tab with the most comprehensive documentation - manages contract basic information with contractor and building owner management

entities.name: Order Information Tab
entities.description: Displays order/purchase information - affected by changes made in Basic Information tab

entities.name: Accounting Information Tab
entities.description: Management of accounting and financial information for simple contracts - affected by changes made in Basic Information tab

entities.name: Cancellation Information Tab
entities.description: Management of contract cancellation information - affected by changes made in Basic Information tab

entities.name: Screen Initialization Feature
entities.business_logic: Loads contract data from database; Validates company and construction address; Loads master data for dropdowns; Converts VO to FORM data; Saves main VO and order VO to session
entities.description: Simple Contract Screen Data Initialization Function - initializes contract screen with data from database and prepares form for display
entities.validation_rules: Company validation; Construction address validation; Data existence check

entities.name: Simple Contract Registration Feature
entities.output_failure: Forward to form with error messages
entities.business_logic: Validates form data and change check; Updates contract information in database with locking mechanism; Saves contract, order, construction, land, building, employee, and customer relationship data
entities.description: Register or update contract information in D-Smart - handles contract registration and modification with comprehensive data validation
entities.validation_rules: All required fields must be filled; Contract dates must be valid; Customer information must exist; Data change verification

entities.name: Customer/Contractor Update Feature
entities.parameters: {"actionType":{"name":"actionType","type":"String","required":true,"description":"Action routing - keiyakusaki_edit, keiyakusaki_set_main, keiyakusaki_set_sub, keiyakusaki_delete, kenchikunushi_edit, kenchikunushi_set_main, kenchikunushi_set_sub, kenchikunushi_delete"},"uniqueId":{"name":"uniqueId","type":"String","required":true,"description":"Record identification for main/sub/delete operations"},"J0001_hUniqueId":{"name":"J0001_hUniqueId","type":"String","description":"Customer unique ID for edit mode"},"J0002_hUniqueId":{"name":"J0002_hUniqueId","type":"String","description":"Building owner unique ID for edit mode"}}
entities.output_failure: Forward to form with error messages
entities.business_logic: Manages customer and builder relationships; Sets hierarchical relationships (main/sub); Deletes customer relationships; Updates contract-customer relation; Updates individual customer classification; Updates supplementary/main contract info
entities.description: Manage contract customers and building owners (edit, main, sub, delete) - handles customer relationship management with validation
entities.validation_rules: Duplication validation; Record count validation; Deletion condition validation; Main customer requirement; Single main customer rule

entities.name: Contract Validation Feature
entities.parameters: {"actionType":{"name":"actionType","type":"String","required":true,"description":"Action routing - acceptance for approval, seigousei_check for consistency check"}}
entities.output_success: Redirect to /kihonSyoninBack.do or /kihonInit.do (approval) / Forward to form with results (consistency check)
entities.output_failure: Forward to form with error messages
entities.business_logic: Approval: Formally records contract, updates status, saves history, creates snapshots; Consistency Check: Business validation without database writes; Executes comprehensive business rule validation
entities.description: Execute contract approval (acceptance) or consistency check (seigousei_check) - validates contract data and manages contract lifecycle
entities.validation_rules: Business rule validation; Data consistency check; Status transition rules; Authority verification for approval

entities.name: Basic Information Form
entities.description: Main form for simple contract basic information input and submission - contains all contract, customer, construction, and validation data

entities.name: Contractor Form
entities.description: Form for contractor (customer) management operations - edit, main, sub, delete actions

entities.name: Building Owner Form
entities.description: Form for building owner management operations - edit, main, sub, delete actions

entities.name: Unique ID Field
entities.validation_rules: Must be valid unique identifier
entities.description: Unique ID for form or record identification

entities.name: Case Classification Code Field
entities.validation_rules: Must be valid case classification code
entities.description: Case classification code for contract categorization

entities.name: Contract Card Type Code Field
entities.validation_rules: Must be valid contract card type code
entities.description: Contract card type classification code - YUUSYOU for Simple Input Contract

entities.name: Tab Code Field
entities.validation_rules: Must be valid tab code from ConstantsKbnCode.java
entities.description: Tab code for UI tab navigation - identifies which tab is currently active

entities.name: Contract Type Code Field
entities.validation_rules: Valid master code; Required field
entities.description: Contract type code - must match valid entry in M_KEIYAKU_KBN

entities.name: Contract Type Name Field
entities.validation_rules: Display only - populated from master data
entities.description: Contract type name - display text for contract type

entities.name: Construction Form Code Field
entities.validation_rules: Valid master code; Required for specific contract types
entities.description: Construction form code - identifies the type of construction

entities.name: Customer Unique ID Field
entities.validation_rules: Must be valid unique identifier for customer record
entities.description: Customer unique ID for customer block operations (edit, main, sub, delete)

entities.name: Customer Name Kana Field
entities.validation_rules: Katakana characters only
entities.description: Customer name in katakana format

entities.name: Customer Name Field
entities.validation_rules: Cannot be null or empty; Required field
entities.description: Customer name - primary customer identifier

entities.name: Customer Telephone 1 Field
entities.validation_rules: Phone number format; Numbers and hyphens only; Maximum 15 characters
entities.description: Customer primary telephone number

entities.name: Customer Number Field
entities.validation_rules: Numbers only; Maximum 10 characters; No customer duplication per contract
entities.description: Customer number - unique identifier for customer in system

entities.name: Building Owner Unique ID Field
entities.validation_rules: Must be valid unique identifier for building owner record
entities.description: Building owner unique ID for building owner block operations (edit, main, sub, delete)

entities.name: Building Owner Name Field
entities.validation_rules: Required if building owner is specified
entities.description: Building owner name - primary building owner identifier

entities.name: Construction Property Name Field
entities.validation_rules: Required for construction projects
entities.description: Construction property name - identifies the property being constructed

entities.name: Residence Address Field
entities.validation_rules: Address completeness - all required if any is entered
entities.description: Residence address - full address of construction site

entities.name: Contract Conclusion Date Field
entities.validation_rules: Valid date format YYYY/MM/DD; Must be before start date; Reasonable range check
entities.description: Contract conclusion date - date when contract is formally concluded

entities.name: Memo Field
entities.validation_rules: Free text field
entities.description: Memo field for additional notes and comments

entities.name: Basic Information Form Data Session
entities.lifecycle: Maintained across tab navigation within contract editing session; Cleared on logout or session timeout
entities.stored_data: KihonForm object containing contract basic information including contract, customer, construction, and validation data
entities.description: Preserves form data when navigating between tabs in simple contract screen - ensures data consistency across tab operations

entities.name: Previous Screen Information Session
entities.lifecycle: Set when entering simple contract screen; Used to determine return navigation
entities.stored_data: Previous screen information including screen ID, navigation parameters, and return path
entities.description: Stores information about the screen that navigated to simple contract - used for proper back navigation and context preservation

entities.name: Main Contract VO Session
entities.lifecycle: Loaded on screen initialization; Updated on contract registration; Cleared on session end
entities.stored_data: KeiyakuVO object containing complete contract data structure with customer relationships, order information, and supplementary data
entities.description: Main value object containing all contract data - central data structure shared across all tabs

entities.name: Order VO Session
entities.lifecycle: Loaded on screen initialization; Updated on contract registration; Cleared on session end
entities.stored_data: JyutyuVO object containing order information related to the contract
entities.description: Order value object containing all order data - used by order information tab

entities.name: Visit Information Session
entities.lifecycle: Set when coming from sales selection; Used in sales integration flow
entities.stored_data: VisitInfoVO object containing sales visit information including selected items and visit context
entities.description: Stores sales visit information when contract is created from sales selection screen - enables sales integration workflow

relationships.description: Changes in tab:basic_information affect this tab
Changes in tab:basic_information affect this tab
Changes in tab:basic_information affect this tab
